CommandDefinition.Name: clearworkspace
CommandDefinition.ExtendedDescription: . The following objects will be removed from the workspace: - trigger instances - triggers - filter instances - filters - xmom objects (workflows, datatypes, services, exceptions) - shared libraries - application definitions . For each of these categories one can define objects not to be removed in comma separated lists as Xyna Properties: - xfmg.xfctrl.appmgmt.clearworkingset.blacklist.triggerinstances.<workspaceName> - xfmg.xfctrl.appmgmt.clearworkingset.blacklist.triggers.<workspaceName> - xfmg.xfctrl.appmgmt.clearworkingset.blacklist.filterinstances.<workspaceName> - xfmg.xfctrl.appmgmt.clearworkingset.blacklist.filters.<workspaceName> - xfmg.xfctrl.appmgmt.clearworkingset.blacklist.xmomobjects.<workspaceName> - xfmg.xfctrl.appmgmt.clearworkingset.blacklist.sharedlibs.<workspaceName> - xfmg.xfctrl.appmgmt.clearworkingset.blacklist.applications.<workspaceName> . .

BoolOption.Name: f
BoolOption.Description: Aborts all running orders and removes Cron Like Orders

Argument.Name: removeSubtypesOf
Argument.Description: Base types whose subtypes should be removed except they are directly needed by an blacklisted object (by default subtypes of service-outputs of blacklisted applications will not be removed). Use '*' for all subtypes.
